page.title: 12Lavenham Clubs
page.content: Football,cricket and tennis are played to a high club standard on the Community Council field.Badminton and short tennis are played in the school hall.Most pubs have darts teams.There is snooker at the British Legion and pool at the Angel Hotel.The nearest leisure centres are B.S.E and Sudbury. Country walks are popular.A local orchestra gives regular concerts in the Church.Singing and recorder groups give charity concerts.Other clubs:Over 60's, W.I,Weavers(for disabled) pony,racing pigeon and bird clubs;bridge club;men's lunch club,ladies' lunch club;Keep Fit; Young Farmers.Visits to local theatres are organised by the Theatre Club.For the young:Playgroup;ballet and tap- dancing;Youth Club;Scouts,Cubs,Guides, Brownies;discos at the Angel Hotel;play equipment is provided on the Common,the Playing Field and Meadow Close.
